doc: Used for justifying the text inside a widget. (See also ).

members.doc: The text is placed at the left edge of the label.
members.name: left

members.doc: The text is placed at the right edge of the label.
members.name: right

members.doc: The text is placed in the center of the label.
members.name: center

members.doc: The text is placed is distributed across the label.
members.name: fill

name: Justification
